title: A2UI (Agent to UI) Client-to-Server Event Schema
description: Describes a JSON payload for a client-to-server event message.

userAction.description: Reports a user-initiated action from a component.

name.description: The name of the action, taken from the component's action.name property.

surfaceId.description: The id of the surface where the event originated.

sourceComponentId.description: The id of the component that triggered the event.

timestamp.description: An ISO 8601 timestamp of when the event occurred.

context.description: A JSON object containing the key-value pairs from the component's action.context, after resolving all data bindings.

clientUiCapabilities.description: Informs the server about the client's capabilities, such as the component catalog it supports. Exactly ONE of the properties in this object must be set.

catalogUri.description: A URI pointing to a predefined component catalog schema that the server advertized, and the client supports.

dynamicCatalog.description: An inline JSON object that defines the client's supported components.

components.description: A map where each key is a component name and the value is a JSON Schema defining an object containing its properties.

error.description: Reports a client-side error. The content is flexible.
